name: Socrates Foundation For Enhanced Learning
briefDescription: Socrates Foundation works to integrate 21st century teaching & learning pedagogy in schools. It promotes the habit of creative and critical thinking in children & to equip them with the tools necessary to develop their leadership, communication & problem solving skills. This is done through activities specially designed to develop an inquiring mind & attitude, creativity and wisdom.We also seek to transform the learning process by helping students, teachers, administrators, parents and others interested in education and promoting critical thinking, to implement best practices in learning and teaching.
